item.title: MIUI V13.0.11.0.SLACNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 12S Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12S Ultra China

Codename: thor

Version: V13.0.11.0.SLACNXM | 12.0

Size: 7.6 GB

MD5: bbefeb715cb0a241924b08612558f75f

Changelog:
[System]
New: Memory extension is available now
Optimization: System responsiveness
Optimization: Overall responsiveness and performance
Optimization: Optimized power consumption so multiple apps running in the background don't drain battery
Optimization: Switching between Wi-Fi and mobile data when Wi-Fi connection is weak

Download: Here
